page.title: 08School Afternoon
page.content: When we have finished playing at lunchtime and it is time to go in, my mum, Mr Davies or Mrs Sherwood (or teachers) clap their hands and we all line up at the door. We go inside. The infants go through the corridor to their classroom and the juniors usually go through the dining room to their classroom. In our classroom we go and sit in the library so that Mr Davies can tell us what we are going to do. After that we go and sit at our tables and we do our spellings, or tables which is learning to do numbers. Sometimes we do painting or finishing off writing. We work till about 2.55 and then Mr Davies reads us a story. After that we say our prayers ready to go home. Sometimes we do after school clubs such as cricket or gymnastics with Mr Davies.
